titleInfo.title: WSM Grand Ole Opry star Mel Tillis with the Statesiders at the Stage Coach Inn

mods.abstract: One color window card (split fountain, red to blue, on white) announcing Grand Ole Opry stars Mel Tillis, the Statesiders, Leon Boulanger and Jim Alley at the Stage Coach Inn on December 9. Poster features a metal photoplate of Mel Tillis.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
